labels.greekStrongs: the visible heavens and all their phenomena

labels.hebrewMeaning: expanse of the sky; the space above the earth that holds the sun

labels.greek: all inhabited lands; parts of the earth

waters_1.name: waters
waters_1.notes: the waters below and the waters above (GEN 1:7)

labels.hebrewMeaning: region above the earth: the heavens
labels.firstRef: in which the clouds and tempests gather

labels.hebrewMeaning: expanse of the sky; the space above the earth that holds visible objects like clouds
expanse of the sky; the space above the earth that holds the sun
region above the earth: the heavens
labels.firstRef: in which the clouds and tempests gather

labels.hebrewStrongs: dry land (in contrast to bodies of water)

labels.greek: all inhabited lands; parts of the earth

labels.greekStrongs: a forest where wild beasts were kept for hunting; a pleasure-park
labels.firstRef: a garden of trees of various kinds; used in the LXX for the Garden of Eden
a forest where wild beasts were kept for hunting; a pleasure-park

Eden_1.name: Eden
Eden_1.notes: various theories exist including locations in the Seychelles

Pishon_1.name: Pishon
Pishon_1.notes: various theories exist including Wadi Baysh

Havilah_1.name: Havilah
Havilah_1.notes: The gold of that land is good; the bdellium and the onyx stone are there (GEN 2:12).  Various theories exist regarding modern equivalents including locations in Babylonia

Gihon_1.name: Gihon
Gihon_1.notes: It flows around the whole land of Cush (GEN 2:13).  Various theories exist about modern equivalents including the Nile River

Cush_1.name: Cush
Cush_1.notes: First mention: GEN 2:13.  Various theories exist regarding modern equivalents including Ethiopia or locations in Babylonia.

Nod_1.name: Nod
Nod_1.notes: Only mentioned in GEN 4:16.  May be a term for wandering rather than a specific place.

labels.hebrewMeaning: streets of [the] city or spacious city

Sodom_1.name: Sodom
Sodom_1.modern: in the valley south of the Lisan peninsula

Gomorrah_1.name: Gomorrah
Gomorrah_1.modern: in the valley south of the Lisan peninsula

Admah_1.name: Admah
Admah_1.modern: in the valley south of the Lisan peninsula

Zeboiim_1.name: Zeboiim
Zeboiim_1.modern: region south of the Lisan peninsula

Chaldea_1.name: Chaldea
Chaldea_1.modern: region of Iraq from Baghdad to Kuwait

Canaan_1.name: Canaan
Canaan_1.modern: coastal region of northern Israel into Lebanon

labels.english: Land flowing with milk and honey

labels.hebrewMeaning: shoulders [and upper part of the back]; [poss.] shoulder [saddle of a hill]

Jordan_1.name: Jordan
Jordan_1.notes: First mention: GEN 13:10 in the context of the Jordan valley

Elam_1.name: Elam
Elam_1.modern: Southern Iran near the Persian Gulf
Elam_1.notes: First mention: GEN 14:1. Susa was the onetime capital (openbible.info)

Valley of Siddim_1.name: Valley of Siddim
Valley of Siddim_1.modern: valley south of the Dead Sea

labels.hebrewMeaning: Ashteroth of the pair of horns [twin peaks?]

King's Valley_1.name: King's Valley
King's Valley_1.modern: intersection of Kidron Valley and Valley of Hinnom

labels.hebrewMeaning: well that belongs to the Living One seeing me

Beersheba_1.name: Beersheba
Beersheba_1.modern: Tel Beer Sheva (near Bir es Seba)

Machpelah_1.name: Machpelah
Machpelah_1.notes: First mention: GEN 23:9.  Worth 400 shekels of silver (GEN 23:15)

labels.greekMeaning: label for the country lying between the rivers Tigris and Euphrates
label for the country lying between the rivers Tigris and Euphrates

Esek_1.name: Esek
Esek_1.modern: in the region between Gerar and Beersheba

Gilead_1.name: Gilead
Gilead_1.modern: hill country west-northwest of modern Amman and loosely associated with the Jabbok River

Edom_1.name: Edom
Edom_1.modern: A region between the Dead Sea and the Gulf of Aqaba

Dinhabah_1.name: Dinhabah
Dinhabah_1.notes: possibly Khirbet el Muhatta or Dannea

Moab_1.name: Moab
Moab_1.modern: Area east of the Dead Sea

Masrekah_1.name: Masrekah
Masrekah_1.modern: within 5 km of Jebel el Musraq (modern)

Rehoboth_2.name: Rehoboth
Rehoboth_2.modern: Possibly Ras Rihab or near Wadi Ghuwayr

Atad_1.name: Atad
Atad_1.modern: near the mouth of the Jordan River

labels.hebrewMeaning: meadow of Egypt or mourning of Egypt

Pithom_1.name: Pithom
Pithom_1.modern: possibly Tell er Retaba or Tell el Maskhuta

Midian_1.name: Midian
Midian_1.modern: East of the Gulf of Aqaba

Succoth_2.name: Succoth
Succoth_2.modern: possibly Tell el Maskhuta or Jabal Maryam
